action_modal.details: For bookings made on or after April 6, 2020, be sure to consider the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) and associated government measures. If you don’t book a flexible rate, you may not be entitled to a refund. Your cancellation request will be handled by the property, based on your chosen policy and consumer law where applicable. During times of uncertainty, we recommend booking an option with free cancellation. If your plans change, you can cancel free of charge until free cancellation expires.
action_modal.title: Check your booking conditions

banner.subtitle: We recommend booking an option with free cancellation in case your travel plans change.
banner.title: As of April 6, 2020, your chosen cancellation policy will apply, regardless of the coronavirus.

hotel_text.important_information:
Please present the same credit card used to guarantee your booking when checking in / making payment at the hotel. If you are making payment using another cardholder's credit card, kindly provide the following to the hotel prior to your arrival: 1) Authorization letter with cardholder's signature 2) Copy of the cardholder's card (front and back of card with cardholder's signature) Please note that hotel may contact the cardholder for verification purposes. 
According to the requirements under Vietnamese law, clients must present their Identification Papers/ Passport and Birth Certificate (for children) of each passenger in the group at check-in. 
In the absence of birth certificates for children, Guests and Tour Operator agree that children’s ages will be converted from their heights, specifically: For child under 3.3 foot tall, his/her converted age is under 4 years For child under 4.6 feet tall, his/her converted age is between 4 and 12 years For taller child, his/her converted age is above 12 years 
Guests are responsible for checking the room furnishing and facilities, foods or drinks in mini-bar upon check-in and check-out as per regulations of the resort.
Please note that rate is not inclusive of Vinpearl Land Ticket.

In accordance with government guidelines to minimize transmission of the coronavirus (COVID-19), this property may request additional documentation from guests to validate identity, travel itinerary, and other relevant info on dates where such guidelines exist. Due to the coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result. Guests are required to show a photo ID and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply. Please inform Vinpearl Discovery Coastalland Phu Quoc of your expected arrival time in advance. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly using the contact details in your confirmation.

policies.content: You can cancel free of charge until 30 days before arrival. You'll be charged the total price of the reservation if you cancel in the 30 days before arrival.

All children are welcome. 4 children under 4 years stay free of charge when using existing beds.
4 children from 4 to 12 year are charged  VND 1640000 per night when using existing beds.
There is no capacity for extra beds in the room.
The maximum number of total guests in a room is 10.
There is no capacity for cribs in the room.
Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
WiFi is available in public areas and is free of charge.
Free public parking is available  on site (reservation is needed).
You'll be charged a prepayment of the total price at any time.
The property reserves the right to pre-authorize credit cards prior to arrival.
10 % VAT is included. A City tax is not applicable. A Service charge is not applicable.
items: A City tax is not applicable.
A Service charge is not applicable.

messages: Check for travel restrictions. Travel might only be permitted for certain purposes, and touristic travel in particular may not be allowed.
info_banners.title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) support

soldout_rooms.name: Ocean View Villa 3 Bedrooms with Safari Ticket
